tool_description: SMMRY is an automatic summary generator.  SMMRY is accessible by an API. Developers are able to implement SMMRY into applications that may require a summary of a webpage or variable. Developers need to generate an API key to access this feature.
name: SMMRY
title: SMMRY

api_list.name: Summarize

optional_parameters.name: SM_LENGTH
optional_parameters.description: number of sentences returned, default is 7

optional_parameters.name: SM_WITH_BREAK
optional_parameters.description: summary will contain string [BREAK] between each sentence
